src:
Nova pot okrog Triglava
Juliana Trail je krožna pohodniška pot okoli Julijskih Alp, ki pohodniku omogoči drugačno doživetje našega očaka in njegovega pogorja.
05 Nov 2019, 13:58 by Primož Hieng



JULI1Začetek in konec poti je v Kranjski Gori.



JULIA2Ob poti si lahko ogledamo trdnjavo Kluže.



JULIANA_03.JPGPogled za petzvezdično doživetje



Pot vodi ob vznožju Triglava.


Skupnost Julijskih Alp je v Logu pod Mangartom simbolično odprla novo daljinsko pohodniško pot okoli julijskih Alp – Juliano Trail, ki ponuja priložnost za razvoj lokalnega gospodarstva.


Pogled za petzvezdično doživetjeJULIANA_03.JPG

Mag. Maja Pak, direktorica Slovenke turistične organizacije (STO), je ob tej priložnosti poudarila, da je Juliana Trail skoraj šolski primer odgovora na izzive in cilje, ki so si jih na STO postavili v aktualni razvojni strategiji našega turizma: »S svojim dodelanim konceptom in poudarkom na kakovosti, edinstvenosti in individualnosti pripomore k izpolnjevanju vizije, da bo Slovenija vedno bolj prepoznavna kot dežela petzvezdičnih zelenih doživetij za zahtevnega obiskovalca, ki išče raznolika aktivna doživetja.«


Ob poti si lahko ogledamo trdnjavo Kluže.JULIA2

Juliana je tudi osrednja nit predstavitve na razstavnem prostoru letošnje globalne borze WTM v Londonu. STO je pred kratkim gostila vplivneža Alexa Strohla, ki je s spremljevalno ekipo prvi prehodil vse etape.Na odprtju so župani občin Tolmin, Kobarid in Bovec v okviru Zelene sheme slovenskega turizma, v katero so občine vstopile letos spomladi, podpisali Zeleno politiko, zavezo destinacije, da bo delovala po trajnostnih načelih in si nenehno prizadevala za izboljšave.Juliana Trail je skupni produkt Julijskih Alp. Gre za 270 kilometrov dolgo krožno pohodniško pot, ki skozi 16 etap obkroži Julijske Alpe. Pohodniku ponuja drugačno doživetje Triglava in njegovega pogorja, spoštljivo in obzirno doživetje Triglavskega narodnega parka nekoliko drugače. Na njej spoznavamo kraje in ljudi ob vznožju gora, pogledi na Triglav in osrčje Triglava so mnogoteri in so pogledi od daleč. Juliana Trail ponuja doživeto spoznavanje preddverja Julijskih Alp, vodi pod visokimi gorami in vanje le spoštljivo vabi.
Spoznavamo kraje in ljudi ob vznožju gora.
Pot okrog Julijskih Alp poteka v smeri urinega kazalca in je razdeljena na priporočljive etape; dnevne so zasnovane tako, da je v krajih začetka oziroma konca etap mogoče prenočiti oziroma bodo tam možnosti za okrepčilo ali nakup hrane in pijače.»Juliana Trail je speljana skozi vasi, ki se danes še skrijejo pred številnimi obiskovalci, slednji pa znajo z novo potjo zmotiti ustaljeno življenje v kraju,« pravijo njeni snovalci. »Pešci, ki se bodo sprehajali skozi vas, bodo vsekakor spremenili dinamiko življenja v njej, kar bodo lokalni prebivalci konec koncev lahko izkoristili s svojo ponudbo obiskovalcem, to je s prodajo lastnih rokodelskih in kulinaričnih izdelkov, gostinsko ponudbo in ponudbo doživetij.«Tehnični podatki o poti Juliana: skupna dolžina je 270 km, skupna višinska razlika pa 7163 m. Pot ima 16 etap, povprečna dolžina ene je 17,5 km. Za tak odsek bi pohodnik potreboval od štiri do pet ur.
Gre za 270 kilometrov dolgo pohodniško pot, ki skozi 16 etap obkroži Julijske Alpe.
Pohodnike bo po njej usmerjal elektronski vodnik na spletni platformi OutdoorActive, kjer bo v kratkem na voljo tudi aplikacija za prenosne telefone. Nastajanju vodnik v knjižni obliki, ki bo bralcem in pohodnikom že ob načrtovanju poti poleg osnovnih informacij ponudil vpogled v doživetja, ki jih čakajo na posameznih etapah.
text:
New route around Triglav
The Juliana Trail is a circular hiking trail around the Julian Alps that gives the hiker a different experience of our dad and his mountain.
05 Nov 2019, 13:58 by Primoz Hieng



JULY1The beginning and end of the trail is in Kranjska Gora.



JULIA2At the way we can see the fortress of Kluže.



JULIANA_03.JPGView for a Five Star Experience



The path leads at the foot of Triglav.


The Julian Alps Community has symbolically opened a new long-distance hiking trail around the Julian Alps in Log pod Mangart, offering an opportunity to grow the local economy.


A look for a five star experienceJULIANA_03.JPG

Mag. Maja Pak, Director of the Slovenian Tourist Organization (WTO), emphasized that Juliana Trail is almost a school example of responding to the challenges and goals set by the WTO in the current development strategy of our tourism: “With its completed concept and with its emphasis on quality, uniqueness and individuality, it helps to fulfill the vision that Slovenia will become more and more recognizable as a land of five-star green experiences for a demanding visitor looking for a variety of active experiences. "


Along the way we can see the fortress of Kluže.JULIA2

Juliana is also the centerpiece of the showcase at this year's WTM Global Exchange in London. The WTO recently hosted influencer Alex Strohl, who with the accompanying team was the first to go through all stages. At the opening, the mayors of the municipalities of Tolmin, Kobarid and Bovec signed the Green Policy, a commitment of the destination under the Green Scheme of Slovenian Tourism, which the municipalities entered this spring to work on sustainable principles and constantly strive for improvement.Juliana Trail is a joint product of the Julian Alps. It is a 270 kilometer circular hiking trail that surrounds the Julian Alps through 16 stages. It offers the hiker a different experience of Triglav and its mountains, a respectful and considerate experience of Triglav National Park slightly different. We get to know the places and people at the foot of the mountains, the views of Triglav and the heart of Triglav are many-sided and are views from afar. The Juliana Trail offers a knowledgeable experience of the lobby of the Julian Alps, leads beneath the high mountains and invites them respectfully.
We get to know places and people at the foot of the mountains.
The route around the Julian Alps is clockwise and is divided into recommended stages; the daily are designed so that the places of beginning or end of the stage can be spent the night or there will be opportunities for refreshment or purchase of food and drink. »Juliana Trail is led through villages that are still hidden from the numerous visitors today, and the latter are familiar with a new route disrupt the established life of the place, ”say its designers. "Pedestrians strolling through the village will definitely change the dynamics of life in it, which locals will ultimately be able to take advantage of with their offer to visitors, that is, by selling their own artisan and culinary products, catering and adventure offer." about Julian route: total length is 270 km and total altitude difference is 7163 m. The route has 16 stages, the average length of one is 17.5 km. It would take four to five hours for such a hiker.
It is a 270 kilometer long hiking trail that surrounds the Julian Alps through 16 stages.
Walkers will be guided by an electronic guide on the OutdoorActive online platform, which will also feature a mobile phone application shortly. An emerging guide in book form that will provide readers and hikers with the basic information, in addition to basic information, to gain insight into the experiences that await them at each stage.
